title: EDA: supercategories, attributes, correctness
description: Both attributes and categories contain additional supercategory column, which might be the source of insights related to our data. Cloths from the same supercategory are similar in some sense. Attribute's supercategory denotes that it describes some specific property (I.e., length, style).
description_lemmatized: attribute category contain additional supercategory column might source insight related data cloth supercategory similar sense attribute supercategory denotes describes specific property ie length style
